version_description:
This version includes bug fixes and speed improvements, plus new music from A Boogie, Imagine Dragons, Post Malone, Sam Smith, Florida Georgia Line & more.

Love the app? Rate us to let us know.

Have questions or suggestions? DM us @trebelmusic (Instagram) or @trebelapp (Twitter). We are always listening.

We’re constantly updating and improving the TREBEL experience. Keep your updates enabled to make sure you always see the best version of TREBEL.

Redesigned player and new music from Billie Eilish w/ Justin Bieber, Beyonce, Ed Sheeran, Twenty One Pilots, Kenny Chesney, Lil Tecca,
Offset, Taylor Swift, Big K.R.I.T., Fetty Wap & more.
Important bug fixes.

Love the app? Check us out on Instagram @trebelmusic for behind-the-scenes peeks from your favorite artists.

Questions or suggestions? Email​ us at hello@trebelmusic.com. We are always listening.

We’re constantly updating and improving the TREBEL experience. Keep your updates enabled to make sure you always see the best version of TREBEL.

• Bug Fixes and Improvements.
• The app now supports iOS 13.
• Some of our users weren't earning the coins they deserved. We've fixed that!

New music from Taylor Swift, Lizzo, Jeezy, Wiz Khalifa, Chalie Puth, Ava Max, Macklemore, Quality Control, Incubus & more.

We’re constantly updating and improving the TREBEL experience. Keep your updates enabled to make sure you always see the best version of TREBEL:

Bug Fixes and Improvements
• We tuned up the engine and worked hard to make the app faster and more stable than ever.
• We fixed that annoying bug that was forcing some of you to go back and press play after every song.
• Your playlist covers are now made up of the albums in that playlist. Update and see for yourself!

We’re constantly updating and improving the TREBEL experience. Keep your updates enabled to make sure you always see the best version of TREBEL.

• Bug Fixes and Improvements.
• The app now supports iOS 13.

• The app now supports iOS 13.
• Some of our users weren't earning the coins they deserved. We've fixed that!

• Your browse has a new look. Update the app to check it out!
• Now you can preview songs in a playlist before you download it.
• Bug Fixes and Improvements.
• Fixed bug preventing push notifications on iOS 13.

- Selena Gomez
- Chris Stapleton
- Bebe Rexa

We’re constantly updating and improving the TREBEL experience. Keep your updates enabled to make sure you always see the best version of TREBEL.

• Your profile has a new look. Update the app to check it out!
• New music suggestions under playlists, albums and songs.
• Fixed bugs that stopped or skipped your music.

We’re constantly updating and improving the TREBEL experience. Keep your updates enabled to make sure you always see the best version of TREBEL.

Try our new Booster feature. Get your downloads at lightening speed.
Plus holiday music, bug fixes, and performance improvements.

• Search just got an upgrade. Now you can browse through songs, artist, and albums more easily than ever before.
• Now you can search for playlists to find the right music for every moment.
• Find more from your favorite artists by going to their new and improved artist pages.
• Bug fixes and improvements

• Search just got an upgrade. Now you can browse through songs, artist, and albums more easily than ever before.
• Now you can search for playlists to find the right music for every moment.
• Find more from your favorite artists by going to their new and improved artist pages.
• Bug fixes and improvements

• Bug fixes and crash improvements.
• Introducing Offline Mode so you can get the most out of the app when you're not connected to the internet.
• Check your profile! Now you'll see who's been checking you out. This is private to you.
• Fixes to the explicit content tag.

• Improved sign up process
• Bug improvements

• We've added a way for you to select which music genres you like when you register. We can now provide better suggestions for you.
• We've fixed some bugs and improved performance.

• Introducing Song ID. Find the songs that are playing around you with just one tap and in just a few seconds.
• Sync your local music library so your can enjoy all your songs in one place.
• Bug fixes and error correction.
• Bug fixes and issue corrections to prevent crashes.

• Fixed errors and bugs
• Included new top banner to announce special features or events.

• Added entire Sony Music catalog, including artists such as Travis Scott, Beyonce, Sia, Doja Cat, Lil Nas X, DJ Khaled, and many more. The songs you've been waiting for are now available!!!
• We optimized images so your browse screen and the rest of the app loads swiftly.
• Bug fixing and performance improvements.

What's New:
• Big update! We're now recommending artists that you may like.
• In your library, you can now find the list of artists that you follow.
• We've automatically created 3 playlists for you: one with your most played songs, one with your recently played, and one with those you've liked.
• No more need to scroll through dozens of playlists to find the one you play every day! On you Playlists folder, you will now see the last 5 playlists you've played.

Bug Fixes:
• We fixed bugs and issues including a pesky bug that made tiles magically move around, and one that only allowed you to see 20 playlists when you, in fact, wanted to "See All."

What's New:
• Big update! We're now recommending artists that you may like.
• In your library, you can now find the list of artists that you follow.
• We've automatically created 3 playlists for you: one with your most played songs, one with your recently played, and one with those you've liked.
• No more need to scroll through dozens of playlists to find the one you play every day! On you Playlists folder, you will now see the last 5 playlists you've played.

Bug Fixes:
• We fixed bugs and issues including a pesky bug that made tiles magically move around, and one that only allowed you to see 20 playlists when you, in fact, wanted to "See All."

What's New:
• We've made some changes to your coin experience so you can enjoy your music non-stop.
• We've added new suggestions to your library, find new playlists, albums and songs based on the music you like.

• We fixed bugs and issues

What's New:
• We've made some changes to your coin experience so you can enjoy your music non-stop.
• We've added new suggestions to your library, find new playlists, albums and songs based on the music you like.

• We fixed bugs and issues

• We will now notify you when a playlist you've downloaded has been updated. We hope this helps you can discover new music!
• We changed how some details like the dialogs and the menus look.
• We fixed bugs and issues.

• Updates for iOS 14 support.
• We changed how some details like the dialogs and the menus look.

• We've changed the way you navigate around the app and we know you will love it.
• We've made it easier for you to remember to claim your Daily Drop. Free coins every day!
• We've fixed issues and bugs.

• We've made it easier for you to log in if you've forgotten your password
• Selecting which artists to follow has never been easier

• We've made it easier for you to log in if you've forgotten your password
• Selecting which artists to follow has never been easier
• We've fixed bugs and issues

Bug fixes:
• We tweaked some things too small to notice or too difficult to explain.

Do you download? Us too! The downloads screens have gotten a boost and now you will easily find related content, comments, and more! You can also preview playlists and albums to see if you like their vibe. If you're out and about you can save songs to download later.

Do you download? Us too! The downloads screens have gotten a boost and now you will easily find related content, comments, and more! You can also preview playlists and albums to see if you like their vibe. If you're out and about you can save songs to download later.

• In this version we're introducing the brand new "Play Now" section. You can now watch tons of videos and listen to all kinds of music from YouTube.
• Do you want to search for the same artist you looked for earlier today? Check out your list of recent searches!
• We fixed some bugs and smoothed out some corners.

• In this version we're introducing the brand new "Play Now" section. You can now watch tons of videos and listen to all kinds of music from YouTube.
• Do you want to search for the same artist you looked for earlier today? Check out your list of recent searches!
• We fixed some bugs and smoothed out some corners.

• In this version we're introducing the brand new "Play Now" section. You can now watch tons of videos and listen to all kinds of music from YouTube.
• Do you want to search for the same artist you looked for earlier today? Check out your list of recent searches!
• We fixed some bugs and smoothed out some corners.

• Our video functionality just got an upgrade. Save videos to your library so you have easy access to them while you're online.
• Want to tell your friends what you're listening to? You can now share the songs, albums and playlists you love on Instagram Stories and Facebook Stories.
• We've also fixed some bugs so your app works like a charm.

• If there's a music video that you like, you can now easily find the matching song in our catalog, download it and enjoy it whenever and wherever you are! Look for the "Download this song" button under the video.
• We tweaked the download process so it can be faster, better, stronger.
• We've also fixed some issues so your app works like a charm.

• If there's a music video that you like, you can now easily find the matching song in our catalog, download it and enjoy it whenever and wherever you are! Look for the "Download this song" button under the video.
• We tweaked the download process so it can be faster, better, stronger.
• We've also fixed some issues so your app works like a charm.

• We're introducing the new Download List. Add all the songs you want to this list and then download it at the touch of a button!
• We tuned up the engine and gave the artist pages a thorough clean.
• Bug fixes

• We created a system for our content team to bring you more videos. You'll start seeing them soon on your Home.
• Now when you can't find a song you're looking for, we'll quickly and easily redirect you to the music video instead.
• We spent some time fixing bugs to make sure the app runs smoothly.

• To date, this is the biggest update to our player!
- Easily find the lyrics to the songs you love
- Find playlists and albums based on what you're listening
- Quickly switch between audio and video
- See and arrange what plays next with the new Play Queue! Swipe right on the player to see it.

• We improved the download list feature that we introduced in our last version.
• As always, we fixed bugs or issues to make sure you have a smooth experience.

• Watch the music videos for your favorite artists, directly from their artist page.
• Bug fixes and improvements

• When previewing a song, you can now start downloading it immediately.
• We made some improvements to our new podcasts functionality.
• We made lots of improvements to the way content loads so you can have a faster and better app!
• Bug fixes and improvements

• When previewing a song, you can now start downloading it immediately.
• We made some improvements to our new podcasts functionality.
• We made lots of improvements to the way content loads so you can have a faster and better app!

• We made some improvements to our new podcasts functionality.
• We made lots of improvements to the way content loads so you can have a faster and better app!
• Bug fixes and improvements

• When previewing a song, you can now start downloading it immediately.
• We made some improvements to our new podcasts functionality.
• We made lots of improvements to the way content loads so you can have a faster and better app!
• Bug fixes and improvements

• Introducing a new stories feature that will allow us to share videos about releases, news about your favorite artists, and other exciting offers.
• In this release, we also fixed bugs and made performance improvements. Just for you.

• We removed the top banner from the library so you have more room to look at the music you love.
• We made some improvements to the podcast experience.
• You can now listen to podcasts while you navigate the app.
• You can also see the full episode description before playing it in the new podcast episode page.
• We also made other enhancements and fixes.

• We've updated the way you create new playlists. It's now easier to search for music in your library and even select songs from other playlists that you already have.
• Don't let the music stop! Now when you download a single song and play it, we will make sure other songs get queued up.
• Lots of improvements happening behind the scenes. Hopefully you notice the app running more smoothly.

• We've updated the way you create new playlists. It's now easier to search for music in your library and even select songs from other playlists that you already have.
• Don't let the music stop! Now when you download a single song and play it, we will make sure other songs get queued up.
• Lots of improvements happening behind the scenes. Hopefully you notice the app running more smoothly.

• In this version we’re introducing some helpful shortcuts that will allow you to start playing your favorite music right from your TREBEL home page.
• Keep our TREBEL app icon pressed for a second and you will get some quick shortcuts to Song ID, your recently played songs, your liked songs, and the search! Check it out!
• In this version we’re also fixing some pesky bugs. For instance, now when adding songs to your queue, these will stay in the correct order.
